Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints.
Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear constraints where variables are restricted to integers.
Optimization of a nonlinear objective function subject to nonlinear constraints.
Example: Minimizing cost function with nonlinear constraints.

Description: Optimization of a quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints.
Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear constraints with some integer and some continuous variables.
Example: Production planning with discrete and continuous decisions.

Description: Optimization of a convex objective function subject to convex constraints.
Optimization problems where the variables are discrete and the objective function and constraints are combinatorial in nature.
Optimization of multistage decision problems by breaking them down into simpler subproblems.
Solvability: Polynomial time (for problems with optimal substructure and overlapping subproblems)
where some of the data is modeled as random.

Description: Optimization problems with multiple conflicting objectives.
